text: Radoslav Školník (born 14 November 1979 in Košice) is a professional Slovak football defender who currently plays for FK Turkon Vyšné Opátske. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" align=center style="font-size:90%; text- align: center;" |- !width=60 rowspan="2"|Club !width=60 rowspan="2"|Season !width=80 colspan="2"|Corgoň Liga !width=80 colspan="2"|Slovak Cup !width=80 colspan="2"|Europe !width=80 colspan="2"|Total'' |- align=center !width=40 App | !width=40 abbr="Goals for" | !width=40 App | !width=40 abbr="Goals for" | !width=40 App | !width=40 abbr="Goals for" | !width=40 App | !width=40 abbr="Goals for" | |- align=center |rowspan="4" valign=center|MFK Košice ||2006/07 |20||1||1||0||0||0||21||1 |- align=center |2007/08 |28||0||6||0||0||0||34||0 |- align=center |2008/09 |15||1||3||0||0||0||18||1 |- align=center |2009/10 |4||0||2||0||0||0||6||0 |- align=center ! align=left style="background:beige"| Total ! align=left style="background:beige"| ! align=left style="background:beige"| 67 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 2 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 12 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 0 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 0 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 0 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 79 ! align=left style="background:beige"| 2 |} Last updated: 28 December 2009 ==External links== * Player profile at official club website Category:Living people Category:1979 births Category:Slovak footballers Category:FC VSS Košice players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:Sportspeople from Košice Category:Association football central defenders
